dt-event.name: sort
dt-event.summary: Sort event - fired when the data contained in the table is sorted.
dt-event.description:
The `dt-event sort` event is fired whenever the data in the table is sorted. This is typically triggered by the end user sorting a column, but can also be initiated through the `dt-api order()` method and when a full redraw (by calling the `dt-api draw()`) occurs.
Note that the `dt-event page` will be fired before the table has been redrawn with the updated data, although the data will internally have been ordered.
